trans-unit.source: Specifies the constraints of a property in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.

The StylusPointPropertyInfo class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty> class and generates the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Maximum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Resolution%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo.Unit%2A> values used to define the properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
The validity of each property value varies depending on the manufacture of the digitizer and stylus.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> on.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> class using the specified values.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to base the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> on.
The minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
The maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"></xref> values.
The scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into its units.
Gets the maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
The maximum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
Gets the minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
The minimum value accepted for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
Gets the scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into units.
Multiply the resolution by the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> property to get its unit-based value.
For example, if a property's value is 100, the unit is inches, and the resolution is .01, then multiplying 100 by .01 reveals that the value of that property is 1 inch.
The scale that converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property value into units.
Gets the type of measurement that is used by <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyUnit"></xref> values.
